0.title: Distribution of state funds to volunteer fire departments
0.description: The purpose of the bill is to provide for distribution of certain state funds to volunteer fire departments under a Volunteer Fire Department Workers' Compensation Subsidy Program.

1.title: Rule-making authority relating to administration, collection and enforcement of local sales, use and excise taxes by Tax Commissioner
1.description: Rule-making authority relating to administration, collection and enforcement of local sales, use and excise taxes by Tax Commissioner

2.title: Permitting Monongalia County Commission levy district excise tax
2.description: The purpose of this bill is to permit the Monongalia county commission to levy a special district excise tax for the benefit of the “University Town Centre,” which comprises approximately 1,450 contiguous acres of land.

3.title: Establishing Volunteer Fire Department Workers' Compensation Premium Subsidy Fund
3.description: The purpose of the bill is to provide for distribution of certain state funds to volunteer fire departments under a Volunteer Fire Department Workers' Compensation Subsidy Program.

4.title: Relating to magistrate court system compensation
4.description: The purpose of this bill is to immediately increase salaries of those magistrates and their staffs whose salaries were reduced as a result of the 2010 census to precensus amounts. The bill also requires the Joint Committee on Government and Finance to request a study by the National Center for State Courts on the weighted caseload, salaries, jurisdiction, and apportionment of the magistrate court system. The bill also requires the Supreme Court of Appeals of West Virginia to present recommendations regarding the allocation or assignment of magistrates to improve the magistrate process and more equitably distribute the magistrate court resources. The bill provides an internal effective date. The bill provides that the salary increases are retroactive to January 1, 2013. The bill also requires pay equalization for all magistrates and certain magistrate employees beginning January 1, 2017.

5.title: Relating to local sales and use taxes and excise taxes
5.description: The purpose of this bill is to grant the Tax Commissioner exclusive responsibility for administering, collecting and enforcing specified local sales and use taxes and excise taxes.

6.title: Making supplementary appropriation from Civil Contingent Fund and Consumer Protection Fund
6.description: Making supplementary appropriation from Civil Contingent Fund and Consumer Protection Fund
